p: Petasites hybridus subsp. ochroleucus, (a subspecies of Petasites hybridus) was the plant material studied in the project. This subspecies is spread mainly in the eastern, central and southern parts of the Balkan Peninsula [ 1, 16], and is endemic to the southern Balkan region. It is distinguished from the more common and widely distributed, red-flowered subspecies P. hybridus subsp. hybridus, which is related more to the northern and western parts of the Balkans, as well as to the rest of Europe.
